charaepi_general_talk_search_2070_m23_2/:
All right. Time to case the scene in preparation for
our Pokémon thefts!

James, we need to think of a way to distract the
Trainers before we steal their Pokémon!

Use your noggin to figure out what might get a
Trainer to take their eyes off their Pokémon!

I heard about a town that also holds a fireworks
festival. Apparently, if you make a wish during the
fireworks show, it’ll come true!

Think that might work on Pasio, too? Fireworks are
pretty much the same everywhere you go.

So if we make our wishes here on Pasio, then find
another town that’s holding a fireworks festival
and make our wishes there, too...

We’ll have double the shot of our wishes
coming true!
Making wishes during the fireworks show, huh?

When the Trainers close their eyes to make their
wishes, they won’t be watching their Pokémon!

So if we make our wishes here on Pasio, then find
another town that’s holding a fireworks festival
and make our wishes there, too...

We’ll have double the shot of our wishes
coming true!

When the Trainers close their eyes to make their
wishes, they won’t be watching their Pokémon!

No way I’m lettin’ my Pokémon outta my sight!
I gotta make sure they don’t get lost in the crowd!
Aw, man! You’re just too cute! I can’t take it!

That’s right. You’d better keep a close eye on your
Pokémon, or else bad guys like us might try to
steal it!

That’s right. You’d better keep a close eye on your
Pokémon, or else bad guys like us might try to
steal it!

Wh-what do you want?! Didn’t I tell you to look
the other way?
What? You found some suspicious-looking people?
Strengthen the bonds of sync pairs? Preposterous!

Just seeing sync pairs with strong bonds makes
me wanna scream!

That’s why we’re gonna steal their partner
Pokémon and ruin their fun time together!
H-huh? You want to stop them? Hey! Wait!
It’s not like we have to help [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ], but...
We can’t have someone else stealin’ Pokémon!
That’s right! Let’s go!

All those powerful Pokémon are ours for
the taking!
Did you guys hear that?!

The nerve! How dare they try to call dibs on
stealing Pokémon!

Yeah! If anyone’s going to snatch all those
Pokémon, it’s us!

Er... Snatch them to safety, I mean! Whatever!
Just get ready to battle!
Thank you for helping me!

I can’t believe there are actually bad guys like
that on this island...
Hmm? The fireworks are about to start?

We better get going, then. We can’t miss the
main event!

All these partner Pokémon will soon belong to
Team Rocket!

Now’s our chance, James! Grab the Pokémon the
second its Trainer looks away!

Zone out on your own time, James! We gotta steal
these Pokémon and take ’em to the boss!

I have to steal the Pokémon the second its
Trainer looks away!

*sigh*
I wish I could find that talking Meowth again...

I might be able to distract that Trainer if I bring
Meowth here!
That little Purrloin is back?! Where?! Show me!

This reunion’s gotta be fate! We’re meant for each
other, you and me!

You’re that talking Meowth from before! Ohhh!
I can’t take it! You’re just the best!
Ack! Get outta here, you!

And just like that, we’ve snagged all the partner
Pokémon in this area!
What’s wrong? You look pretty nervous.

To tell you the truth, I’m thinking of confessing
my love to—
Don’t rush into anything!

Make sure she’s the right person and choose your
words carefully. When I was younger, I promised
I would marry a girl named Jessebelle, and...

What’re you doin’ gettin’ so caught up tellin’ your
whole life story?! We’re here to distract Trainers
and steal their Pokémon!
Look! A Luvdisc!

Get a good look! They say that couples who see
Luvdisc are guaranteed eternal love!
What?! Luvdisc?! Where?!
Eeeek! These fireworks are too scary for me!

You there! Watch my partner Pokémon for me
while I go hide in the restroom!
Lucky me! I’ll nab this Infernape, too!
Whoa! It’s really mad!

Weaken it with some kinda move! A Water-type
move oughta do the trick!

Let’s see if any of the Pokémon we’ve stolen can
use Water-type moves.

It’s sayin’ it’ll help ya out if ya let it go back to its
Trainer afterward.
That all depends on how well you perform here!
Bibarel, use Water Gun!
We got ourselves an Infernape, too!
Purrloin, use Scratch!
That’s not a Water-type move!
Zubat, use Absorb!
That’s not a Water-type move!

And just like that, we’ve snagged all the partner
Pokémon in this area!
All right. It’s time to vamoose!
Prepare for trouble!
Make it double!
To protect the world from devastation!
To unite all peoples within our nation!
To denounce the evils of truth and love!
To extend our reach to the stars above!
Jessie!
James!
Team Rocket, blast off at the speed of light!
Surrender now, or prepare to fight!
Meowth, that’s right!

Darn it! This always happens when we go
after a Pikachu!
Looks like Team Rocket’s blasting off again!

Hey, c’mere. I’ve got a secret to tell ya just
between us Pokémon.
Don’t tell [Name:PlayerNickname ], though.
More Pokémon for Team Rocket!
